document.heading: Emergency Medical Services Improvement Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-147, the “Emergency Medical Services Improvement Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-170 which was referred to the Committee on Public Safety and Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 8, 2008, and February 5, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 25, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-313 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-147 became effective on April 15, 2008.
